content.en: Algorithm optimization: Researchers have explored various methods and strategies for improving learning and classification algorithms. These include prototype selection methods, hierarchical clustering, information theory, self-organizing feature maps, LVQ3-type algorithms, fast nearest neighbor search algorithms, adaptive prototype learning algorithms, prototype optimization techniques, hybrid solutions with SVM post-processing, genetic algorithms, local feature weighting, Particle Swarm Optimization, iterative prototype adjustment, and feature selection using Particle Swarm Optimization. These algorithms aim to enhance the performance and efficiency of classification systems by reducing irrelevant instances, merging prototypes, optimizing prototypes and distances, and selecting the most relevant features.
content.da: Algoritmeoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder og strategier til forbedring af lærings- og klassifikationsalgoritmer. Disse inkluderer prototypeselektionsmetoder, hierarkisk klyngedannelse, informationsteori, selvorganiserende featurekort, LVQ3-type algoritmer, hurtige nærmeste-nabo-søgealgoritmer, adaptive prototypelæringsalgoritmer, prototypeoptimeringsteknikker, hybride løsninger med SVM-efterbehandling, genetiske algoritmer, lokal featurevægtning, Particle Swarm Optimization, iterative prototypejustering og feature-selektion ved hjælp af Particle Swarm Optimization. Disse algoritmer har til mål at forbedre ydeevne og effektivitet af klassifikationssystemer ved at reducere irrelevante instanser, flette prototyper, optimere prototyper og afstande samt vælge de mest relevante features.
